name: Creeping In The Dark
description:
Creeping in the Dark:

The game contains two interwoven narratives; Helen's quest to light the beacons of her prison to alert the Spartan soldiers to her location, and Helena going around her home to find batteries for her torch. The Game plays as an escape room where you need to check what you can interact with.

Game Concept Document: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1oooeC5S8hBnKJirSmv8F7Od51B5g3LHK/view?usp=shari...
